content.College Info: Baba Ghulam Shah Badshah University (BGSBU), located in Rajouri, is a prestigious A NAAC accredited government institution offering world-class university programs. The college is known for its excellent academic standards, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and strong industry connections. Students gain admission through University Entrance and benefit from experienced faculty, modern laboratories, and comprehensive learning resources. The institution maintains high placement rates and provides students with opportunities for research, internships, and skill development programs.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • Engineering and Technology

    B.Tech: Civil, Computer Science, Electrical, Electronics and Communication, Information Technology, Mechanical; M.Tech in relevant engineering disciplines; Diploma Engineering; PhD in Engineering and Technology

  • Management

    BBA (Honours), MBA, PhD in Management Studies, B.Voc (Tourism and Travel Management), MBA (Hospitality and Tourism Management)

  • Science

    B.Sc (Honours): Biotechnology, Zoology, Botany, Physics; M.Sc: Biotechnology, Botany, Zoology, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry, Environmental Science; PhD

  • Social Sciences

    BA (Honours): Economics, Islamic Studies, History, Sociology, Political Science and International Relations; MA: Economics, Islamic Studies; PhD in related subjects

  • Nursing and Biomedical Sciences

    B.Sc Nursing

  • Humanities and Languages

    BA (Honours): Arabic, English, Urdu, Hindi, Linguistics, Sanskrit; MA Arabic, MA Persian, PhD
